alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 4:04PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jackson and northeastern Washington Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 304 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chipley, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chipley, Bradford, Cottondale, Alford, Wausau, Richter Crossroads, Brock Crossroad, Chipley Municipal Airport, Orange Hill, Kynesville, Ridgetop, Steele City, Gilberts Mill, Round Lake, Cottondale Airport, Bahoma, Sunny Hills and Poplar Head. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
